subject: Your AI Workforce Assessment - {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.companyName }}
html:
Thank you for your assessment!

Hi {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.contactName }},

We've received your AI workforce assessment for {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.companyName }}.

What we're analyzing:

  • Your strategic priorities: {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.strategicPriorities }}
  • Operational bottlenecks: {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.operationalBottlenecks }}
  • Departments of interest: {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.departmentsOfInterest.join(', ') }}

Next Steps:

  1. Our AI Solutions Architect is analyzing your requirements
  2. You'll receive a detailed proposal within 24 hours
  3. We'll prepare a demo environment tailored to your use case

If you have any immediate questions, feel free to reply to this email.

Best regards,
The JeweledTech AI Team

Assessment ID: {{ $node['Validate Assessment Data'].json.assessmentId }}
